mapper.sql: EDU_ORDERS.ORDER_ID, EDU_ORDERS.COURSE_ID, EDU_ORDERS.USER_ID, EDU_ORDERS.ORDER_NO, EDU_ORDERS.SUM_MONEY, EDU_ORDERS.STATES, EDU_ORDERS.DESCRIBE, EDU_ORDERS.CREATE_TIME, EDU_ORDERS.PAY_TIME, EDU_ORDERS.SYS_USER_ID, EDU_ORDERS.EXPIRE_TIME, EDU_ORDERS.PAY_TYPE
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EDU_ORDERS WHERE EDU_ORDERS.USER_ID=#{userId} AND EDU_ORDERS.STATES=#{states}

SELECT EDU_ORDERS.ORDER_ID as orderId, EDU_ORDERS.COURSE_ID as courseId, EDU_ORDERS.USER_ID as userId, EDU_ORDERS.ORDER_NO as orderNo, EDU_ORDERS.SUM_MONEY as sumMoney, EDU_ORDERS.STATES as states, EDU_ORDERS.DESCRIBE as `describe`, EDU_ORDERS.CREATE_TIME as createTime, EDU_ORDERS.PAY_TIME as payTime, EDU_ORDERS.SYS_USER_ID as sysUserId, EDU_ORDERS.EXPIRE_TIME as expireTime FROM EDU_ORDERS WHERE EDU_ORDERS.ORDER_ID=#{value}

SELECT , EDU_ORDERS.CREATE_TIME as createTime, edu_user.email , edu_user.SHOW_NAME userName, edu_user.PIC_IMG picImg, EDU_COURSE.COURSE_NAME courseName FROM EDU_ORDERS LEFT JOIN edu_user on EDU_ORDERS.USER_ID = edu_user.user_id LEFT JOIN EDU_COURSE ON EDU_COURSE.COURSE_ID = EDU_ORDERS.COURSE_ID WHERE 1=1 order by EDU_ORDERS.CREATE_TIME desc
limit #{limitNum}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EDU_ORDERS WHERE EDU_ORDERS.STATES=#{value}
